snippet: Bidders for One Chase Manhattan Plaza based their offers on converting office space into condominiums, high-end rental apartments, a luxury hotel or a retail mall.
abstract: Landmark tower, 1 Chase Manhattan Plaza, in heart of Manhattan financial district, is on market, but bidders have based their offers on plans to convert the acres of office space into condominiums, high-end rental apartments, a luxury hotel or a retail mall; some urban planners and civic leaders say these plans indicate that New York's second-largest business district is losing its cachet.
lead_paragraph: Bidders for One Chase Manhattan Plaza based their offers on converting office space into condominiums, high-end rental apartments, a luxury hotel or a retail mall.

headline.main: Sale of a Landmark Building Reflects the Changing Needs of Lower Manhattan
headline.print_headline: Sale of a Landmark Building Reflects the Changing Needs of Lower Manhattan
